alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Calhoun and Talladega. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Anniston, Oxford, West End-Cobb Town, Cobb Town, Saks, Lincoln, Munford, Hobson City, Bynum, Grant Town, Anniston Regional Airport, Talladega Municipal Airport, Talladega Superspeedway, Oxford Lake, Blue Mountain, Honda Manufacturing Of Alabama, Logan Martin Lake, Anniston Army Depot, Jenifer and Eastaboga.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
